sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import MyHeader from './MyHeader'; import MyFooter from './MyFooter'; import { H2 } from 'govuk-react'; function ViewMedicalRecords() { return ( <>

VIEW MEDICAL RECORDS

Your GP Health Records

Your record shows personal data, such as your details, allergies and medications.

Depending on what your GP surgery shares, you may also see:

  • forename
  • surname
  • NHS Number
  • VaccineID
  • Dose Number
  • VaccinationDate
  • Total Number of Doses
  • CountryofVaccination
  • booster

Medical Record {index + 1}

Forename: {record.forename}

Surname: {record.surname}

NHS Number: {record.nhsNumber}

Vaccine ID: {record.vaccineId}

Dose Number: {record.doseNumber}

Vaccination Date: {record.vaccinationDate}

Total Number of Doses: {record.totalDoses}

Country of Vaccination: {record.countryOfVaccination}

Booster: {record.booster ? 'Yes' : 'No'}



); } export default ViewMedicalRecords;
